prompts: Create a playful water-type Pokemon that glides effortlessly through the ocean waves.
Imagine a cute aquatic creature with a smooth body and large, expressive eyes.
Design a friendly Pokemon that loves to surf and play with trainers in the water.
Show me a serene Pokemon that embodies the calmness of the sea with its gentle movements.
Generate a small, enchanting Pokemon that can be found near coral reefs and sandy beaches.
Give me a charming creature that has a unique ability to communicate with other sea life.
Make a whimsical design for a Pokemon that resembles a manta ray but is much cuter.
